title: Bug 12906 - Cannot open file in multiple editors
description: Bug 12906 - If a file is already opened in one editor, it should give a warning message when trying to open it in another editor.
OB: When attempting to open a file in multiple editors, no warning message is displayed and the file is opened in the second editor without any indication of the conflict.
EB: However, when trying to open a file that is already opened in one editor in another editor, a warning message should be displayed, indicating that the file is already open in another editor.
SR:
1. Open a file in one editor.
2. Try to open the same file in another editor.
3. Observe that a warning message is displayed indicating that the file is already open in another editor and cannot be opened again.
